Interface GUIViewInterface

All Superinterfaces:
ViewInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
GUIView
public interface GUIViewInterface extends ViewInterface
A ViewInterface for all GUI-related functionality. Objects of this type should be used whenever the GUI is involved.
